dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue:
This is the faculty survey which accompanies the student survey conducted since 1976 by the sociology department (SOC 86 87).

Variables include: honor code violations, parking, water system, women's rights, and black enrollment.

keyword.keywordValue: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill--Faculty

publication.publicationCitation: """Project report,"" Chapel Hill, N.C.:Department of Sociology, 1978 (mimeographed)"
